name: math-with-science
description: Math with Science is an open source project contains math and science problem solvers and the goal is to help anyone struggling with any equation and and anyone can improve the project

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run test" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.heroku-prebuild: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd .. && cd client && npm run prebuild && npm run build && cd ..

author: rawand-faraidun <201.rawand@gmail.com>
